response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. It's not just an item; it's a testament to quality and functionality. Given its exceptional features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. For you, I am offering this remarkable product for $100. This price reflects its true value and the benefits it will bring to you. I trust that you will find its qualities to be well worth the investment. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product.", "product_price": 100}
